directions: In a bowl, combine juice and sugar, stirring until sugar is dissolved.  Stir in milk, a little at a time, until fully incorporated.  Pour into a shallow dish and freeze until firm.

Break sherbet into chunks and beat with an electric mixer until smooth.  In a separate bowl, whip evaporated milk until stiff.  Fold into frozen mixture.  Return to shallow dish and freeze again until firm.  Serve.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can very cold evaporated milk
title: Orange Sherbet II
